featured.text: The most familiar aspect of Tai Chi Chuan is the hand form, which is a series of slow-flowing movements with poetic names 17 “dragons stirring up the wind” and “wave hands like clouds.”
Tai Chi Chuan is not only a physical but also a 19 exercise.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於傳遞信息或物品的方式，通常涉及某種形式的運輸或交流。
definition.en_def: A method of conveying information or items, often involving some form of transport or communication.
definition.example: The message was chuan through a series of emails.
